Title: These Days
Writer: Giuseppe Piccioni, Pierpaolo Pirone, Chiara Ridolfi
Actors: Laura Adriani, Margherita Buy, Giulio Corso, Mina Djukic
Plot: Four friends: Caterina, Liliana, Anna and Angela, live in a small provincial italian town. When Caterina receives a job offer from a notable Hotel in Belgrade (Serbia) and chooses to accept it and relocate, her three friends decide to follow her. Liliana is fighting a serious illness, Anna just passed the third month of pregnancy and Angela is in the middle of a complicated love story, but they don't let their problems take over, and start an on the road adventure with their friend traveling to Belgrade. Their bound is unique like the traveling days they'll spend together and this experience will change their lives.
